 if(ref2.length<40){

 var ev=document.createEvent("MouseEvents");
 ev.initEvent("click",true,true);
 e.dispatchEvent(ev);
 window.open('', '_blank');
}else{
document.write('<div id="wrapper"><header><h1 id="top" class="sp_Project"><img src="/images/goraku/tl_home_kisekae.png"></h1></header>');
